rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment reports factual information without high-potency language.
The verbs describe status ('constituted', 'was made up') and reporting ('said'). The number ('more than 5.3 million') describes flock size, not impact.
The segment does not contain a question.
The segment reports a fact, lacking explicit calming language.
The segment contains a number ('more than 5.3 million') but no minimiser.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Reports details of an infected flock and culling requirement ('required to be euthanized'), describing a response measure without active reassurance.
